title: RE/PLAY - Video Editor

embed.description: Ever wanted to be in one of those gameplay montages full of lens flares and beautifully composed edits? Well, here's your chance! To celebrate the release of Xayah and Rakan, we're highlighting some of your best plays in a unique montage video that will be featured in the client.

body:
As I logged in League today, I came across the "RE/PLAY" news. Basically - people can send their best plays for a Montage which would be featured in the Client.

My question is - who will be the video editor? Can a bunch of enthusiasts hop in?

I'm a recently-graduate Motion Designer with high experience in game montages (have created the official Game Trailer of S4League + a bunch of CS 1.6 videos while I was in the most successful Kreedz studio at the time) - if there is any opportunity for me to create an edit which RIOT would feature, I do not want to miss that chance!

I searched for RIOT's e-mail, but the best way for me to contact them so far is this thread.
Does anyone know where I can contact those in charge of the video project?
Which discussion would this thread apply to? 

Really would appreciate the help!

PS: Obviously, I am aware that a video editor has already been assigned. I'm simply eager to join any further video-editing projects, in case there are any.

replies.body: I would suggest looking at their [Careers page](http://www.riotgames.com/careers), as chances are it'll be an internal Riot team working on this project.
